item.title: Detecting Solar Panels from satellite images part 1 -- data preparationüõ∞Ô∏è
item.description: I’m writing a series of posts on detecting solar panels from satellite images at my company, Appsilon. To be honest, not from satellite images but from orthophotos. If you don’t know what are orthophotos, the good news is that the first post has been released recently!.
